item.title: Black women, you are not failing, and we love you.
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Black women, you are not failing, and we love you.

Chi Ilochi

I don’t know who needs to see this, but please sis take it one day at a time. You’re human. And you’re doing your best. It’s okay to not be okay 💜✨

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Black Lives Matter 5280#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Black Lives Matter 5280

#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still in our feelings about the lack of Black nominees for #ColoradoTeach...eroftheYear. From your shout outs we put together a list of 32 Black educators in Denver and Aurora that deserve all the props for their #Blackeducatorexcellence! We're excited to share that BLM5280 is pledging to honor their general dopeness with a $50 award to each nominee BUT if we can get 160 of y’all to give just $10 we can double that and send each educator $100! Send your contribution at the link below and be sure to label it ‘#BlackEducatorsMatter’.

www.venmo.com/BLM5280

Like, share, and comment 'done!' so this post doesn't get buried! ✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿

See More

item.title: "During his 48+ years of his imprisonment, Jalil has...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

"During his 48+ years of his imprisonment, Jalil has accomplished the following: Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology, Bachelor of Science degree in Psychology, Certificate of Architectural Drafting, Certificate of Computer Literacy.

He has established many programs, such as the first Men’s Group for therapeutic training in the NY State prison system, an African/Black Studies program, a computer literacy class, a Sociology class and a poetry class. He has received two commend...ations for preventing prison riots. He has raised money for the children’s fund, was office manager of the computer lab and a teacher’s aide for GED classes.

Jalil is also the recipient of several certificates for rehabilitation programming, and is a published author, poet, educator and blogger.

As a human rights advocate, he had the first U.S. prisoners national petition heard and recorded by a Special Committee at the United Nations on U.S. prisons and the existence of U.S. political prisoners. He has litigated several civil rights complaints on behalf of prisoners. In 2000, Essence magazine featured an article on father-daughter relationships. The article, entitled “Daddy Says,” quoted Jalil stressing the importance of maintaining these relations even during incarceration."
-freejalil.com
#FREETHEMALL #DecarcerateNOW

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿

GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and Girls

Let today’s walk and lessons from #AnitaHill give you the courage that you need to say the hard things that need to be said. To whoever it needs to be said to. ...

Even if it’s not popular. Even if no one believes you. Your truth is your truth.

No more muted tongue. Let it be what it will be. No more pleading through pursed lips. Stand firm sisters.

We have for generations kept secrets, swallowed lies, tolerated the intolerable for fear of what would come should we simply speak.

Well, let the words come. Let them flow like the Jordan River. Spit fire with each syllable. Let the phrases burn down the walls that have caged you.

Be free. Be healed.

And then promise to never betray yourself with silence again. #BlackHistoryBootcamp

See More

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
